findings.title: Handler.sol: Possible transfer of 0 ETH
findings.description: The `transferBribe()` function does not check to ensure `msg.value > 0` when sending the bribe, which may result in unnecessary gas fees.

findings.title: BPErc20Delegator.sol: Unused return values
findings.description: The `_setFixedReservedInterest()`, `_setFixedInterest()` and `_setInterestRateModel()` functions do not return the values of their respective `delegateToImplementation()` calls.

findings.title: BrokerPool.sol: Incorrect description of parameter argument
findings.description: Incorrect description of `repayAmount` parameter as `-1` to indicate full repayment amount, which is not possible since the type is `uint`. Instead, `type(uint).max` is used in `repayBorrowFresh()` function.

findings.title: Potential gas optimization in function borrowUpdateBalance()
findings.description: The `AssetsManager.borrowUpdateBalance()` function is executed for all assets in `borrowAssets`, even though the given `amount` can be `0`. Consider returning early from the function in case `amount` equals `0` to save on gas fees.

findings.title: AssetsManager.sol: Function withdrawAllAssets() fails to verify amounts length
findings.description: The function `withdrawAllAssets()` fails to verify that the `amounts` array is the same length as the `assets` array.
